turns: A cake is cut twice in x-direction and then twice in y-direction. How many pieces result? Let's work things out in a step by step way to be shure we have the right answer.
ground_truth: After two cuts in the x-direction and two cuts in the y-direction, you will have 9 pieces of cake.
